Text: Checked! Excellent quality. English sub included!
It's just to big to open on an average PC. On MPC and VLC subs blink  and the movie freezes right before the last scene. KMP and GOM fail to show subs at all. Fail.
@apchitz, any "average" computer will have no problems opening the file. 2.7GB is no where near too big.
They forgot to do the subtitles at the end, after they show all names and who did what.
